headline: Samba TV Report Finds Advertiser Confidence is Up with 68% of Top 100 Brands Accelerating TV Advertising in First Half of 2025

headline: Verizon: Irresistible Value For Dividend Investors
summary: Verizon beats Q2 estimates, raises 2025 forecast, offers a 6.4% dividend yield, and strong cash flow - making VZ a top dividend-focused Telco investment. See more.
